title: SmartFTP 3.0.1018.1 - Patch.rar
description:
What is SmartFTP?

SmartFTP is an FTP (File Transfer Protocol) client which allows you to transfer files between your local computer and a server on the Internet. With its many basic and advanced features SmartFTP also offers secure, reliable and efficient transfers that make it a powerful tool.

Download

SmartFTP can be used for:

    * Web site publishing and maintenance
    * Upload and download of images, documents, movie and music files
    * Share your files with your friends and coworkers
    * Backups of local or remote files

SmartFTP 3.0 Build 1019 released
What&#039;s New

    * SFTP over SSH
      Secured connection to SFTP servers over SSH.
    * Thumbnail View and Preview for Remote Browser
      Thumbnail view is a great way to see image files on the server. The Preview feature shows images, html and text files with one click.
    * Visual Compare
      Compare folders and visually display differences between their content.
    * Improved Usability
      Simplified confusing transfer methods (Direct/Queue) by creating a powerful hybrid. Eliminates manual supervision of transfers.
    * Email Notifications
      Receive emails when transfers complete or fail.

    * Change Log Change Log
